content.title: Persons With Disabilities Scheme In Colleges: Financial Assistance To Visually Challenged Teachers
content.department: Ministry Of Social Justice and Empowerment
content.details: The Scheme has been formulated to help visually challenged permanent teachers to pursue teaching and research with the help of a Reader and by using teaching and learning aids by way of providing Readerâ€™s Allowance and funds for the purchase of Braille books, recorded materials, etc.
benefits: Allowance to visually challenged permanent teachers will be Rs.36000/- p.a.
Any other related/ required material/equipment for research, teaching, and learning.
eligibility: All the visually challenged teachers who are working in colleges in India, which are included under Sections 2(f) and 12B of the UGC Act.
documents_required: Visually Disability Certificate issued by a Government Hospital as per norms

faqs.question: What is financial assistance for visually challenged teachers?
faqs.answer: Financial assistance for visually challenged teachers refers to various programs, grants, scholarships, or financial aid offered to support visually impaired individuals pursuing a career in teaching.

faqs.question: Who is eligible for financial assistance for visually challenged teachers?
faqs.answer: Eligibility criteria may vary depending on the specific program or scheme. Generally, individuals with visual impairments or blindness who are pursuing or planning to pursue a career in teaching may be eligible.

faqs.question: What types of financial assistance are available for visually challenged teachers?
faqs.answer: Financial assistance programs can include scholarships, grants, bursaries, or stipends specifically designed for visually challenged teachers.

faqs.question: How can I apply for financial assistance for visually challenged teachers?
faqs.answer: The application process may vary depending on the specific program or organization offering the financial assistance.

faqs.question: Are there any specific organizations or agencies that provide financial assistance to visually challenged teachers?
faqs.answer: Several organizations, foundations, government agencies, educational institutions, and disability support centers offer financial assistance programs for visually challenged teachers.

faqs.question: Can I receive financial assistance for professional development activities as a visually challenged teacher?
faqs.answer: Some financial assistance programs may cover the costs associated with professional development activities.

faqs.question: Are there any repayment obligations for the financial assistance received?
faqs.answer: The repayment requirements, if any, will depend on the terms and conditions of the specific financial assistance program.
